Title: Prohibits the sale of any children's product, upholstered furniture or mattress that contains textile fiberglass
Summary: Prohibits the sale of any children's product, upholstered furniture or mattress that contains textile fiberglass; prohibits any custom upholsterer from repairing, reupholstering, recovering, restoring or renewing upholstered furniture or reupholstered furniture using a replacement component that contains textile fiberglass.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of any children's product, upholstered furniture or mattress that contains textile fiberglass
